951: Our client is looking for a Staff Accountant to join their team! You will be responsible for preparing and analyzing financial records for their company. About the Company: A learning environment with direct hands on exposure/learning from the CFO Clear expectations, process orientated and best of all a great group of people to work with! Great workplace culture- team is very close, and it makes a great workplace environment. Leadership is very involved with day to day operations, making sure they are there available to assist and be involved! Each and every day is truly exciting as the drive for success is real. Therefore, you will always be pushed and there is never a dull moment which I believe calls for a lot of excitement and learning opportunities along the way. Responsibilities preferred for the Staff Accountant: The Staff Accountant will compile and analyze financial information to prepare entries to general ledger accounts. Assisting/guiding other team members when needed- 6 other people on the team. Working hand-in-hand with the CFO and assisting with audits, budgets, etc. The Staff Accountant will also handle month-end, quarter-end and year-end closing activities. Analyze financial information detailing assets, liabilities, and capital. Prepare balance sheet, profit and loss statement, and other reports to summarize current and projected company financial position. Prepare reports to substantiate individual transactions prior to monthly close process. Establish, modify, document, and coordinate the implementation of accounting and accounting control procedures. Qualifications preferred for the Staff Accountant: BS in Accounting, Finance or Business Administration highly preferred but not required 3+ years General Accounting required Fundamental knowledge of GAAP Attention to detail Excellent written and verbal communication skills Tech-Savvy #INMAY2023 #CBMAY2023
